bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of females who following delivery experience heart-pressure as a result of blood stasis. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao: 百病主治藥：蒲黃，血運、血癥、 血煩、血痛、胞衣不下，並水服二錢 , “For pu huang [to cure] blood[-induced brain] movements, blood concretion-illness, blood vexation , blood pain, and failure of the placenta to come down [following delivery], ingest 2 qian with water”.
